summary: A comprehensive pytest test suite for the instructor library that verifies decorators, signature extraction, function formatting, schema generation, response model conversion, multimodal handling, async patching, and various utility helpers, ensuring correct interaction with OpenAI and Anthropic backâ€‘ends and proper handling of Pydantic models, security, and type analysis.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability, security, and correctness of the AI SDK components used to generate and process function calls, format prompts, handle multimodal data, and convert responses, thereby supporting robust integration of large language models in production applications.
